True : Buy 10 cases of Crown Lager to receive $5 off. Deals Applied - Multiple times. Applied each time 10 cases of Crown Lager is purchased. False : Buy a minimum of 10 cases of Crown Lager to receive $5 off. Deals Applied - Once

True: Buy 10 cases of Crown Lager to receive 1 free case of Crown Lager. Deals Applied - Multiple times. Applied each time 10 cases of Crown Lager is purchased. False:Buy a minimum of 10 cases of Crown Lager to receive 1 free case of Crown Lager. Deals Applied - Once
